title: Filter authoring info for Building Scene Layer
description: The filter authoring info object contains metadata about hte authoring process for creating a filter object. This allows the authoring client to save specific overridable settings so that the next time it is accessed via an authoring client, their selections are remembered. Non-authoring clients can ignore it. Includes properties such as enabled categories or slider.

visibleFilterType.description: List of visible filter types of the filter.

examples.title: Building Scene Layer filter authoring info
